Title: Was She Ever Good at Her Job?
Writer: Peter Nowalk (created by), Michael Russo, Morenike Balogun (executive story editor), Abby Ajayi (story editor), Sarah L. Thompson (story editor)
Actors: Viola Davis, Billy Brown, Jack Falahee, Aja Naomi King
Plot: Feeling like she's found her purpose again, Annalise focuses on developing her big case as Bonnie grows suspicious. Meanwhile, Connor gets a surprise visit from his dad; Laurel turns to an old friend to relieve stress.
